night-tour.tour-description: Join us an unforgettable evening walking tour of the Fushimi-Inari Shrine, enchanting sites away from the daytime crowds and immerse yourselves in the beautiful lantern light up.

morning-tour.tour-title: Kyoto Early Bird English Tour: Fushimi-Inari and Arashiyama
morning-tour.tour-description: Early morning is the key to avoid the crowds during peak tourist seasons! Hit three of the top historical attractions, Fushimi-Inari Shrine, Bamboo Grove, and Tenryu-ji Temple with our English speaking tour guide!

uji-tour.tour-title: Matcha Grinding Experience and Walking Tour in Uji Kyoto
uji-tour.tour-description: Step into Uji, the Matcha Capital of Japan! Experience the finest Japanese green tea culture with a visit to the historic Byodo-in Temple, followed by an authentic matcha-making workshop.

uji-walking-tour.tour-description: Explore the historic town of Uji, the birthplace of Japanese tea culture. Visit the famous Byodo-in temple and discover the rich history and traditions of Japan's tea capital.

gion-tour.tour-title: Kyoto Gion Early Morning Walking Tour
gion-tour.tour-description: Experience Kyotoâ€™s most iconic sights before the crowds arrive! Our early morning walking tour takes you through the historic streets of Gion, Geisha-district, Kiyomizurdera Temple and Yasaka Shrine.

music-tour.tour-title: Tofukuji Zen Tour: Traditional Music Performance & Tea Ceremony
music-tour.tour-description: Experience the serene beauty of Tofukuji Temple combined with traditional Japanese music and an authentic tea ceremony. This unique tour offers a peaceful journey through one of Kyoto's most magnificent Zen temples, featuring live traditional music performances and a hands-on tea ceremony experience. Immerse yourself in centuries-old traditions while enjoying the temple's stunning architecture and tranquil gardens.
